--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:



> ::Cygnar::
>      He bows his head and shakes it mournfully.  "You are wrong.  
This is not treachery.  This is for the survival of your... no 
Galvatron's faction.  I will submit to no one except him."  He 
glances over at Empath (dumb thing won't do italics) 'No.  This must 
be done here and now.  I don't wish to destroy him.  Only to seperate 
them.'
